message: Hi Bob, let's split the money evenly.
I'd like a bit more, 60-40 sounds fair to me.
How about we meet in the middle, Bob?  This gives us both a little more than a straight split.
Still thinking 60-40 is fair, but I'll compromise a bit.
This is a compromise, Bob - it's closer to your offer but still gives me a bit more than half.
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more than half.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's the most balanced deal you'll get.
